00024 #ifndef _STP_CHOOSE_H__
00025 #define _STP_CHOOSE_H__
00026 
00027 #include "statmch.h"
00028 /* State machines states & debug tools. Sorry, if these are no readable enogth :( */
00029 
00030 #define CHOOSE(a) a
00031 typedef enum STATES THE_STATE_T;
00032 #undef CHOOSE
00033 
00034 char * GET_STATE_NAME (int state)
00035 {
00036 #define CHOOSE(a) #a
00037 static char    *state_names[] = STATES;
00038 #undef CHOOSE
00039 
00040   if (BEGIN == state) return "Begin";
00041   return state_names[state];
00042 }
00043 
00044 #endif /* _STP_CHOOSE_H__ */
